snippet: Wozniacki beat Peng in a semifinal match when Peng retired because of a heat-related illness with the score, 7-6 (1), 4-3. Wozniacki will face Serena Williams in the final.
abstract: Caroline Wozniacki advances to United States Open women's final when her semifinal opponent Peng Shuai retires after collapsing from heat sickness during second set; will face Serena Williams in final.
lead_paragraph: Wozniacki beat Peng in a semifinal match when Peng retired because of a heat-related illness with the score, 7-6 (1), 4-3. Wozniacki will face Serena Williams in the final.

headline.seo: U.S. Open 2014: Caroline Wozniacki Reaches Women’s Final as Peng Shuai Collapses in Heat
headline.main: A Scare and a Disheartening Victory
headline.print_headline: A Scare and a Disheartening Victory
